-- | A library to access bit.ly URL shortener.
--   
--   This package allows to use bit.ly and j.mp URL shortening service from
--   Haskell. Currently it supports shorten and expand requests.
--   
--   API key is required. Please find yours at
--   <a>https://bitly.com/a/account</a>.
--   
--   Configuration file (`~/.bitly`) format:
--   
--   <pre>
--   login = your_bit.ly_login
--   apikey = your_API_key
--   </pre>
--   
--   For command line utility see `bitly-cli` package.
@package Bitly
@version 0.0.8


-- | This package allows to use <tt>bit.ly</tt> and <tt>j.mp</tt> URL
--   shortening service from Haskell programs. See also
--   <a>Network.TinyURL</a> module.
module Network.Bitly

-- | Service credentials.
data Account
Account :: String -> String -> String -> Account

-- | bit.ly login name
login :: Account -> String

-- | API key as found at <a>http://bit.ly/account/</a>
apikey :: Account -> String

-- | Server to use, e.g. <tt>http://api.j.mp</tt>
server :: Account -> String

-- | Account to use with bit.ly
bitlyAccount :: Account

-- | Account to use with j.mp
jmpAccount :: Account

-- | Given a long URL, <tt>shorten</tt> encodes it as a shorter one.
shorten :: Account -> String -> IO Result

-- | Given a short bit.ly URL, <tt>expand</tt> decodes it back into a long
--   source URL.
expand :: Account -> String -> IO Result

-- | Either an error message or a modified URL
type Result = Either String String
instance Read Account
instance Show Account
